DB-IB.rollForPrice: Roll {formula} to Define cost of {item} in {currency}
DB-IB.notEnoughMoney: {actor} do not have enough coins to buy {item}.
DB-IB.manualMonyRemoval: Define with GM price of {item} Define as {itemPrice} and reduce price manually.

settings.rollForBarter: Barter roll when purchasing or selling an item
settings.hintRollForBarter: When you purchase or selling an item from the item browser dialog, a window will pop up asking the player if they want to roll for BARTER to adjust the price according to the rules defined in the RuleBook.
settings.nonCoreSkill: Insert non-core skill name for BARTER
settings.hintSkillBarter: The skill name entered here will be searched on the character sheet to use for the Barter roll.
settings.stashItems: Add tabel for stashed items to Character Sheets.
settings.hintStashItems: This items are own by Character, but are lest in some save space and are not couted toward encumbarace limit.
settings.selling: Add pigi bank icon to item with cost allowing to sell it.
settings.hintSelling: Allow to sell items defoult by 50% of cost, if Bartering option is on it allow to roll for selling as well.

Chat.cannotBuy: You offend the seller, which ends up with no possibility to buy {item}
Chat.cannotSell: You offend the seller, which ends up with no possibility to sell {item}
Chat.nochangeInPrice: You can buy {item} in regular price.
Chat.nochangeInPriceSell: You can sell {item} in regular price.

DB-IB.pickIfYouWantToRollForBartering: Pick if You want to roll for Bartering or not.
